title: @Riot Do you have any plans for a future game (Not league related) that you can let us in on?
body:
I really like this company and it's style,  for it to only have one big game is disappointing. I'm not asking for anything in super-detail, I'm just really looking for a yes or no. Again, this is a great company, I'm curious to see if it has anything in mind for the future. 

As always, hail Poros. {{summoner:31}} {{item:2052}}

replies.body:
Bit of discussion on our thoughts on future games can be found here:

http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20141012/1549/putting-s-riot-games

TLDR: We do have some small teams experimenting with possibilities for new games. Even if one or more of those teams hits on something we think should be made into a full game it'll be quite a while before we've got something ready enough to talk about it though.
Just do us a favour and never neglect League when you guys have your second child please. I've seen that happen so many times.

I mean, let's face it. If Riot Game put out another game, everyone here would buy it just because we're that faithful. If it was free to play, I'd buy whatever cosmetics were in the game just because I don't mind supporting it. 

You guys do amazing work and I respect you all as there can be quite a bit of pressure from the community sometimes. We love this game and will fully support any project Riot decides to take on in the future. 

But... say it was up to you, Meddler, on what type of game you guys started developing. Something with a immersive story? Would you keep it in the world of League? Kind of a broad question, but what kind of game would you like to develop outside of League?
Any chance on bringing back that Cho'Gath game? i never got to play it.
Yeah I've always wondered why it's called Riot Games rather than Riot Game (or Gaming if it was to make more sense).
